Digital Cloud Group is a bridge between Hollywood and the Silicon Valley. The company was founded as an incubator with the ability to form partnerships as well as create, grow and launch creative and new technologies in Social Media, Content Delivery and Content Creation.

Digital Cloud Group was founded by two entertainment industry veterans, Bryan Duran Esq. and Larry Rodriguez with a background in law, finance, technology, and filmmaking.

Latest News

VentureBeat Mobile Summit
March 27, 2012

Digital Cloud Group to attend VentureBeat Mobile Summit April 2-3 2012. VentureBeat editors are again convening the top 180 mobile executives, investors and policymakers for an exclusive discussion designed to shape the future of the mobile industry.
